metadata.title: CVE-2019-7699 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A heap-based buffer over-read occurs in AP4_BitStream::WriteBytes inCodecs/Ap4BitStream.cpp in Bento4 v1.5.1-627. Remote attackers couldleverage this vulnerability to cause an exception via crafted mp4 input,which leads to a denial of service.

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
